Question
========
  
For an income and gender survey, each person in the sample is asked what their annual income, rounded in thousands of euros was in 2015. The following properties apply to this variable: 
Answerlist
----------
* Numeric, ordinal and discrete.
* Categorical, ordinal and continuous.
* Numeric, interval/ratio and discrete.
* Categorical, interval/ratio and continuous.


Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
